cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them at Aliigo, and how you can manage them.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.content: A cookie is a small text file that is stored in your browser when you visit almost any web page. Its utility is that the web is capable of remembering your visit when you browse that page again. Cookies usually store technical information, personal preferences, content personalization, usage statistics, links to social networks, access to user accounts, etc.

section2.title: 2. Cookies used on this website
section2.technicalDesc: Those that allow the user to navigate through the web page and use the different options or services that exist in it, such as identifying the session, accessing restricted access parts (Dashboard), or carrying out the purchase process.
section2.analyticalDesc: Those that, treated by us or by third parties (such as Google Analytics), allow us to quantify the number of users and thus carry out the measurement and statistical analysis of the use made by users of the service offered.

section3.title: 3. Third Parties
section3.content: This website may use third-party services that will collect information for statistical purposes, use of the Site by the user, and for the provision of other services related to the activity of the Website and other Internet services. In particular, this website uses Google Analytics and Supabase (for session management).

section4.title: 4. Management and deactivation of cookies
section4.content: At any time you can exercise your right to deactivate or delete cookies from this website. These actions are performed differently depending on the browser you are using (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge).

privacidad.title: Privacy Policy
privacidad.intro: At Aliigo, we take your privacy very seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with the GDPR and LOPDGDD.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of treatment
section2.content: We treat the information provided by interested persons in order to:
section2.point1: Manage registration and provision of the SaaS (Software as a Service) service.
section2.point2: Manage billing and collection of contracted services.
section2.point3: Send commercial communications about our products or services (only if you have given your consent).
section2.dataRetention: The personal data provided will be kept as long as the commercial relationship is maintained or its deletion is not requested by the interested party.

section3.title: 3. Legitimation
section3.content: The legal basis for the processing of your data is the execution of the subscription contract to Aliigo (Terms and Conditions) and, for the sending of commercial communications, the consent of the interested party.

section4.title: 4. Recipients
section4.content: Data will not be communicated to third parties unless legally obliged or to suppliers necessary for the provision of the service (Data Processors) such as hosting providers (Vercel), database (Supabase), or payment gateways (Stripe).

section5.title: 5. Rights
section5.content: Any person has the right to obtain confirmation as to whether or not we are treating personal data concerning them at Aliigo. Interested persons have the right to access their personal data, as well as to request the rectification of inaccurate data or request its deletion when, among other reasons, the data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.

terminos.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terminos.intro: These General Conditions regulate the use of the services offered by Aliigo through the website.

section1.content: Aliigo is a SaaS platform that allows local businesses to manage their online reputation, reviews, and communications. The service is currently offered in 'Private Beta' mode, which implies that there may be changes, interruptions, or new features added progressively.

section2.content: To use the service, you must register and create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

section3.content: During the Beta phase, the service may be offered under special pricing conditions. Aliigo reserves the right to modify rates with reasonable notice. Payments are recurring (monthly) and can be canceled at any time before the next billing cycle.
